bio.name: Hitesh Choudhary
bio.detailed: Hitesh Choudhary, known as @Hiteshdotcom, is a highly influential figure in the tech education space, serving as a seasoned content creator, educator, and software engineer. While he previously held the significant role of Senior Director at PW (Physics Wallah), where he was instrumental in overseeing technical operations and educational content, he has since retired from that position. His extensive and versatile background includes impactful tenures as a Software Engineer at Amazon Web Services (AWS), where he contributed to cloud infrastructure projects, and at NCR Corporation, focusing on backend development and tech consulting. Beyond corporate roles, his career also encompasses successful freelance web development, expertise in cyber security, and iOS development, showcasing a wide breadth of technical domains. Currently, Hitesh is embarking on a new entrepreneurial venture, co-founding and leading `chaicode.com` alongside Piyush Garg. Through this platform, they are actively conducting advanced tech cohorts, including highly sought-after programs like 'GenAI with Python' and 'Web Development'. He maintains a profoundly impactful YouTube channel with approximately 998,000 subscribers, consistently sharing in-depth coding tutorials and tech insights that resonate with a vast audience. His professional network is exceptionally strong, further amplified by his 373,000 LinkedIn followers and over 500 connections. His entrepreneurial acumen is highlighted by his past success in founding and leading LearnCodeOnline, an ed-tech startup that was notably acquired, demonstrating his significant and lasting impact on affordable tech education.
bio.short: Hitesh Choudhary is a prominent tech educator and entrepreneur who founded the acquired LearnCodeOnline and now co-leads `chaicode.com` for advanced tech cohorts. He commands a large audience with nearly one million YouTube subscribers, sharing extensive coding and tech insights.

data.title: where he is talking about importance of focus
data.text: haan ji! agar appko lagta hai aaj ki date mein hard work mehnat problem hai to aap galat sochte hain. mehnat to dekhiye sabhi kar rahe hain aur jo nahin kar rahe hain vo aur jyada hard work karne ke lie ekdam taiyar hain ready baithe hain. to phir problem kya hai? kyon nahin pahunch pa rahe gol tak? kyon nahin pahunch pa rahe success tak? ab chahe aapka gol success kuchh bhi ho ya jyada paisa kamana ho, bahut achchhi job karna ho ya world tour karna ho. problem pata hai kya hai? problem sabse jyada hai ek singular focus gol ke upar hona aur ek conviction hona ki main jis raste par ja raha hun vah thik rasta hai. ab aapko interesting baat batata hun. pahle ke time pe jab log ek apna gol decide kar lete the to us gol ko kharab karne ke lie us raste se deviate karne ke lie lagta tha ek cousin jo shayad sal mein ek bar aae ya 5 sal mein ek bar aae vo aapke mammi papa se baat karta tha ya aapse baat karta tha aur aap shayad gol se kisi aur gol ki taraf mud jate the ya direction badalte the. aajkal aisa nahin hai. aajkal aapke aapko gol se distract karne ke lie ya phir us gol ke raste ko doubt karne ke lie jyada nahin lagta hai. sirf ek youtube video ya phir ek instagram reel bas isi se aapka rasta deviate ho jata hai. ham apne hi chune hue raste par doubt karne lag jate hain jo ki bahut kharab chij hai. aajkal sirf ek reel lagti hai hansne ke lie. sirf ek reel lagti hai depress hone ke lie. aur isi ke karan se logon ko ek sahi rasta nahin mil pata. ab jo bhi aapne choose kiya hai, baat sirf itni si hai ki aapko singular focus hona hai. us raste pe tike rahna hai. jo bhi aapne choose kiya hai, usko thik manie aur us pe tike rahiye. aap jis bhi famous thode bhi famous personality ko jante hain unke pas ek hi super power hai. singular focus. koi cricket khelta hai to cricket hi khelta hai. koi videos banata hai to videos hi banata hai. koi coding karta hai to coding hi karta hai. vah singular focus hi hai sabse important chij.

data.title: where he is talking about Luck Factor in Life
data.text: life me na ek bahut interesting baat aapko batata hun. life ke andar hai na ek super magical button hota hai. jis button ko hum bolte hain luck factor. ab yeh luck factor activate kaise hota hai? kuch log aapko kahenge mehnat karne se hota hai. mehnat toh dekhiye hum sab bahut kar rahe hain. kuch log shayad aur bhi zyada mehnat kar rahe hain. kuch log thodi kam kuch zyada par kar toh rahe hain. hum mein se bahoton ko lagta hai ki main deserving hun ya main zyada deserving hun. yeh factor yeh sabhi ke dimag mein chalta hai ki nahi nahi maine bahut zyada mehnat kari hai. samne wale se toh hamesha hi zyada mehnat kari hai. lekin sachchai ki baat yeh hai ki sirf akeli mehnat kaam nahi aati. yeh jo secret button hai na luck factor yeh bahut kaam karta hai. ab aap mein se bahut sare logon ne suna hoga ki mehnat karne se luck badal jata hai. lekin aisa nahi hai. yeh bahut hi magical button hai. aur hume nahi pata yeh but yeh jo button hai, yeh kab activate hota hai. kuch ke liye yeh button activate ho jata hai 1 saal ki mehnat ke baad. kuch ke liye 5 saal, kuch ke liye 10 saal, kuch ke liye 20 saal, kuch ke liye 40 saal aur kuch ke liye kabhi nahi. yeh jeevan ki sachchai hai. jitna jaldi ho sake is baat ko zehen mein utaar lo. isko maan lo ki ho sakta hai hamara jo struggle hai aam aadmi se shayad 10 saal zyada hoga ya 20 saal zyada hoga ya shayad jeevan bhar chalega. is life ke fact ko jitna jaldi maan loge 1 minute ka dukh toh hoga lekin uske baad life bahut aasan ho jayegi. jitna jaldi ho sake maan lo. baki aapki ichha hai mano toh mano nahi mano toh mat mano.

data.title: where he is talking about advantages of using VIM over VS code
data.text: Next hai any good advantages of using vim over vs code nahi mujhe nahi lagta ki as such koi advantage hai. Hopefully prime jan na dekh raha ho video baki to thik hai but mujhe nahi lagta as such koi high end advantages hain jo aap keyboard binding aur muscle memory vim pe kar sakte ho vo aap helix pe bhi kar sakte ho vahi same kam aap vs code pe bhi kar sakte ho. Baat yah hai ki kisi bhi code editor ko use karne se pahle kya aapane keyboard pe 10 din ya 15 din bitae hain agar aapane vo 10 din ya 7 din aapane invest kare hain us edit pe to aapako usake bhi shortcut pata lag jaenge to aap bhi usmen almost utani hi speed achieve kar payenge jo aapko vs code mein milati hai ya fir aapako jo vim mein milati hai. Vim ke shortcuts thode comparatively mujhe click nahi karte hain kyonki vo jo keyboard matlab map hota hai vo mujhe itna achchha nahi lagta aur configuration mein mujhe thode issues aate hain usko bar-bar karte raho yar luva files aur ye vo to mujhe usse jyada better helix lagata hai agar aapane helix nahi dekha to helix nahi dekha aapko dikhate hain helix ek editor hai.
